title: How can kids use technology in a meaningful way? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technology is a blissful or baneful , that depends on the user . Kids can explore technology through study under the strict supervision of their parents . Parents will guide them to utilize the technology properly , provided if it is known by the parents ; otherwise that technology may start playing a misleading factor for the innocent kids as they are novice about their own mistakes .
Kids learn how to operate pc s and smartphones better than many adults simply by just using them a lot.Whether it be games ,socialising or earning money..
